divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside my house talking on the phone but I heard a rumbling noise and I see that it is not blinking like all planes and helicopter do. so I taught it might be some type of government plane or stuff like that. but this object disappear after I looked at it for a few seconds. it started dimming the white light to red and than i heard no sound at all after either...there was no way it was plane or known object. I could of recognized it right away. this is the second time i see the same thing..but going different directions. and this time as i was sitting down I felt like my ear could hear everything. it was a weird feeling. what are they spreading???
Summary: flying object sounded like a helicopter, white light than turn red and disappear. second time seeing this exact thing in this area.
